name: Adventure in Kana Village
description: Only need to complete the game, you can master all the Katakana and Hiragana,do you believe it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: 1.0 Ghz or above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 9.0 supported card / 1280 x 720 or above Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: 2.0 Ghz or above Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Any non-integrated card with DirectX 9.0 support / 1280 x 720 or above Storage: 600 MB available space
